weekly_fields.label: Set weekly leasing goals with staff and update goal board
weekly_fields.name: field_1

weekly_fields.label: Audit all websites to review accuracy of information once per week
weekly_fields.name: field_2

weekly_fields.label: Approve payroll by 10 am on Monday morning. Ensure all OT are previously approved by RPM. Approve ADP. All punch edits need to have punch edit form as backup and filed on site. All approved RTO should be sent to HR.
weekly_fields.name: field_3

weekly_fields.label: Walk and inspect tour path and model personally on Tuesday and Friday.
weekly_fields.name: field_4

weekly_fields.label: Model, Common Areas, & Hot List apts meet expectations from office to apartment and our common areas (5 senses, mini models). Leave No Trace of trash on grounds or tour path (no cigarette butts, dog poop, ash trays clean and full of sand if applicable, no hoses left out, trash areas clean, mail box areas free of flyers and staples, community boards with timely messages, pool furniture lined like a resort.  No lights out or missing.  Leasing team should be ensuring we meet this expectation daily.  Enter maintenance related discrepancies that consultants cannot do themselves as Service Requests.
weekly_fields.name: field_5

weekly_fields.label: Walk and inspect all amenity areas and section of community with Maintenance partner. Compile action items for next week’s meeting as follow-up items
weekly_fields.name: field_6

weekly_fields.label: Hold and document 1:1 meeting with Maintenance partner. Save agenda for shared folder for RPM and RMM to review
weekly_fields.name: field_7

weekly_fields.label: Prepare for Weekly Office Team Meeting & Complete Weekly Meeting Template with Agenda
weekly_fields.name: field_8

weekly_fields.label: Hold 1:1 meeting with your team. Document agenda
weekly_fields.name: field_9

weekly_fields.label: Review status of renewals report for current month and next month. Ensure team is calling residents up for renewal weekly.
weekly_fields.name: field_10

weekly_fields.label: Ensure all new apps are submitted to lease audit team for approval within 72 hrs of application date
weekly_fields.name: field_11

weekly_fields.label: Ensure all new applications taken have leases executed within 7 days of application
weekly_fields.name: field_12

weekly_fields.label: Ensure the FAS are being processed timely (10 days from move out)
weekly_fields.name: field_13

weekly_fields.label: Verify sparkle kit is stocked and office team wiping down/replacing bulbs in apts as needed
weekly_fields.name: field_14

weekly_fields.label: Review Reports
weekly_fields.name: field_15

weekly_fields.label: Ensure Preferred Employer Program spreadsheet is updated and 1 new PEP is secured weekly
weekly_fields.name: field_16

weekly_fields.label: Review Office and Breakfast inventory levels and plan/order accordingly
weekly_fields.name: field_17

weekly_fields.label: Inspect that Leasing Consultants are properly completing the M/I inspection sheets before M/I and that move in packets are ready for current weeks move ins.
weekly_fields.name: field_18

weekly_fields.label: Shadow one leasing tour per Leasing Consultant
weekly_fields.name: field_19

weekly_fields.label: Review aged service requests-escalate to RPM and RMM as needed, also review open make readies and average turn times
weekly_fields.name: field_20

weekly_fields.label: Review Renter’s Insurance report, send out follow up letters/calls as needed for expired/no insurance
weekly_fields.name: field_21

weekly_fields.label: Review resumes in ICIMS if you have open position(s) to fill/contact Recruiting as needed
weekly_fields.name: field_22

weekly_fields.label: Update the Open Positions spreadsheet in the Residential PMD folder
weekly_fields.name: field_23

weekly_fields.label: Complete weekly leasing activity report by COB Saturday
weekly_fields.name: field_24

weekly_fields.label: Complete Weekly Occupancy Report and 30/60/90 renewal update
weekly_fields.name: field_25
